info.title: TogetherPlan API
info.description: API documentation for the TogetherPlan project. This API allows users to manage events, participants, voting on dates, groups, and notifications.

post.summary: Submit a vote for a date option
post.description: Allows an authenticated user to vote 'yes', 'maybe', or 'no' on a date option. Recalculates the best date for the event.

date_option_id.description: ID of the date option to vote on

The date option id field is required.
